mapper.select: SELECT c.category_name, c.category_id, e.element_id, e.element_name, e.element_picture FROM workout_element e INNER JOIN workout_category c ON e.category_id = c.category_id

SELECT we.element_id, we.element_name, we.element_picture, wc.category_name, wg.instruction, wm.memo_content FROM workout_element we LEFT JOIN workout_category wc ON we.category_id = wc.category_id LEFT JOIN workout_guide wg ON wg.element_id = we.element_id LEFT JOIN workout_memo wm ON wm.element_id = we.element_id WHERE we.element_id = #{id}
